channel.title: Need a free image editing tool
channel.description:
I have 40 images that I need combined to create an animated looped gif. Anyone have a link to a free image program that will do it?
thnks!

item.description:
yup. Ok so that confirms it is my image program that is seeing it wrong. Thanks!

item.title: Need a free image editing tool
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
mkay thanks guys. gonna go try gimp.

Edit: ugh. Looks like crap! Every gif animation tool I have tried keeps putting lines in the image. Is there anyone here that is an image guru that can help?

https://sdrv.ms/15ovfE4 Take a look at the bmmonitor.gif.

Edit 2: And now that I look at it in the browser, the lines arent there. Hrm. Must be the image program looking at the gif? What do you guys see?

Read full topic

item.title: Need a free image editing tool
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
GIMP does it pretty easily. Just open all the images as layers than then save it as a gif.
